short.ar: Shoot Robbers هي لعبة مهارات مسلية حيث تحاول الحصول على درجة عالية من خلال إطلاق النار على كل اللصوص الذين يقتحمون منزلًا.

short.ko: Shoot Robbers는 집에 침입한 모든 도둑을 쏴서 높은 점수를 얻는 재미있는 스킬 게임입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shoot Robbers is a fun skill game where you try to get a high score by shooting all the thieves who break into a house.
There is a house in the game. Thieves haunt this house. Every thief entering the armed house is very dangerous. We warn thieves to evacuate the home from a point close to the home. The thieves who do not listen to these warnings respond by shooting. We respond to shooting thieves by shooting. Get points by hitting the thieves seen through the windows before they shoot at us. We are trying to achieve high scores with the points we have earned. Shoot the Thieves is a fun skill game designed for gun game lovers.
To swipe Install this extension to play the Shoot Robbers  Game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact us at support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
